Content:: Aurelio González Puente (born 26 July 1940) is a Spanish former road bicycle racer who won the Mountains classification in the 1968 Tour de France and the Mountains classification in the 1967 Giro d'Italia. He also won stages in the Tour de France, Giro d'Italia, Tour de Suisse and Dauphiné Libéré.  This biographical article related to a Spanish cycling person born in the 1940s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
